page.title: 06POPULATION AND HOUSING
page.content: {Employment:}The main occupation of the people in this area is{farming,}mainly dairy ,pig and arable.Many of these people have lived in this area practically all their lives.There are 15 farms in this area.The average number of people per household is 4,therefore the total{population}is approximately 60-100 people. There is no nucleus of a community centre therefore monthly{shopping}trips are required to different towns ,near the area.The main town used in this area is Street,as there is a large Tesco supermarket. There are some delivery services, however, for example a bakers van. {Houses}are heated in different ways, the main ways used by these people is central heating,some also use wood burners.The main transport used is cars.Most people own a colour TV.
